item.description:
Hello all,

Tracy and James would like to extend an invitation to the grop to meetup at the Mapletree cafe in Simsbury. The band playing tonight is called Avenue Groove and they play 80s, 90s and top 40 stuff. I'll be going. Can't pass up an opportunity to dance!

I hope some of you will be able to join us. We'll be there late so come on down.

 

Take care,

Margaret
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the loud silly ones

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Go dancing! I know it's a departure from our typical game night.
